localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Figma Comments allows you to view and add new comments right from your phone. All you have to do is connect your Figma account and select the files you need. And as your teammates reply, you will see the new comments on the app, in real-time!
blogPost.body: Figma Comments allows you to view and add new comments right from your phone. All you have to do is connect your Figma account and select the files you need. And as your teammates reply, you will see the new comments on the app, in real-time!
blogPost.title: Figma Comments on Mobile - View and add comments on Figma using your mobile device.
blogPost.author: Sahil Dave

localize.description: Figma Comments允许你在手机上直接查看和添加新的评论。您所要做的就是连接您的 Figma 帐户并选择您需要的文件。当你的队友回复时，你将会在应用程序上看到新的评论，而且是实时的。
localize.tagline: 使用您的移动设备在Figma上查看和添加评论。

localize.description: Figma Comments允許你在手機上直接查看和添加新的評論。您所要做的就是連接您的 Figma 帳戶並選擇您需要的文件。當你的隊友回覆時，你將會在應用程序上看到新的評論，而且是實時的。
localize.tagline: 使用您的移動設備在Figma上查看和添加評論。

previous.excerpt: Previewed is a mockup generator which makes 3D accessible to everyone. Take snapshots from all angles and create animations that will engage your audience.
previous.title: Previewed 3D - Pixel perfect 3D device mockups & animations

localize.description: 预览是一款模拟生成器，它让每个人都能使用3D。从各个角度拍摄快照，并创建动画，吸引你的观众。
localize.tagline: 完美的像素3D设备模拟和动画。

localize.description: 預覽是一款模擬生成器，它讓每個人都能使用3D。從各個角度拍攝快照，並創建動畫，吸引你的觀衆。
localize.tagline: 完美的像素3D設備模擬和動畫。

next.excerpt: Buffelist is a URL listing platform to reach high-quality content on the internet by letting people reach other's content suggestions. You can also share your content suggestions by creating your list. Briefly, Buffelist is a social bookmarking platform.
next.title: Buffelist - Content link listing platform to share useful content links

localize.description: Buffelist是一个URL列表平台，通过让人们达到别人的内容建议，来达到互联网上的优质内容。你也可以通过创建你的列表来分享你的内容建议。简单来说，Buffelist是一个社交书签平台。
localize.tagline: 内容链接列表平台，分享有用的内容链接

localize.description: Buffelist是一個URL列表平臺，通過讓人們達到別人的內容建議，來達到互聯網上的優質內容。你也可以通過創建你的列表來分享你的內容建議。簡單來說，Buffelist是一個社交書籤平臺。
localize.tagline: 內容鏈接列表平臺，分享有用的內容鏈接
